name: Bird Hunt - Multiplayer
description:
Challenge your friends with multiplayer mode or play by yourself with single mode.

Features:

- Click shopping to get free coins and buy new weapons.
- Smaller bird will get you higher score.
- Send animation message to your opponent.
- Intuitive control.
- Play by yourself with single mode.
- Invite your friends by multiplayer mode 1 and wait for acception to play.
- Play with anyone who want to play quick game at the moment by multiplayer mode 2.
- Check invitation for challenges.
- For best practice, turn on "sync" in the setting of your device.
- Unlock various achievements after completing the missions.
- Reach the TOP of Leaderboard to compete with friends.
